Comments:
### Column Summary: Comments

---

#### 1. Purpose

The **Comments** column is used to capture additional context, notes, or status updates regarding the technical migration, modernization, or decommissioning activities for an application or its infrastructure components. It includes progress updates, blockers, confirmations, technical details, and next steps, often referencing timelines, dependencies, or stakeholder communications.

---

#### 2. Unique Values

- **Total Unique Values:** 120+
- **Examples:**
  - "There is no STRUTS framework as part of the application architecture at present. The same was eliminated and the corresponding modules were rewritten in Java Springboot."
  - "App fully Decommissioned"
  - "GCP Migration is completed for Database. DB VMs decommissioning planned by Q2 2025 due to HRIMS dependency."
  - "Already done, as part of PCF migration"
  - "TBD, due to Business priorities"
  - "App migration completed on 14 Feb, yet to decommission"
  - "6 VMs are pending, Followed with PDO. Internal dependencies."
  - "Modernized Struts to Java Angular and Springboot"
  - ...and many more.
- **Nature of Values:** Free-text, frequently updated, may include specific dates, individual names, ticket numbers, and reasons for project status.

---

#### 3. Histogram (Top 10 Most Frequent Values)

| Comment                                                                                                               | Count |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------|
| This is not partial. Timeline is correct                                                                              | 9     |
| Database servers & EAMS Status decommissioned                                                                         | 7     |
| No VMs in latest VM Data file                                                                                         | 7     |
| EAMS status is already decommissioned                                                                                 | 7     |
| App fully Decommissioned                                                                                              | 5     |
| This is going to decommission completely in 2026 and functionality will get merged in DCDS Hub                        | 4     |
| App is Decommissioned                                                                                                 | 4     |
| Migration completed. Decom in progress.                                                                               | 4     |
| As per PCF exit, team migrated to Springboot                                                                          | 4     |
| TBD, due to Business priorities                                                                                       | 4     |
| PCF BMIT app in Flight. There is a Possible spill over to Q2 due to Design change. Revised timeline & approval...     | 4     |
| Already done, as part of PCF migration                                                                                | 4     |
| DB Migration completed                                                                                                | 4     |

_(Other values have lower frequencies, with a long tail of unique or nearly unique comments.)_

---

#### 4. Observations

- **Content Types:** Status updates (completed, pending, in progress), technical details (technology stack, migration type), blockers (e.g., dependencies, business priorities), confirmations, and exceptions.
- **Usage:** Highly unstructured, can include critical information for project tracking, risk management, and stakeholder communication.
- **Redundancy:** Some comments are repeated for multiple entries, indicating common statuses or outcomes.

---

#### 5. Example Histogram Visualization

```
|█████████████                | This is not partial. Timeline is correct (9)
|███████                      | Database servers & EAMS Status decommissioned (7)
|███████                      | No VMs in latest VM Data file (7)
|███████                      | EAMS status is already decommissioned (7)
|████                         | App fully Decommissioned (5)
|███                          | This is going to decommission completely in 2026... (4)
|███                          | App is Decommissioned (4)
|███                          | Migration completed. Decom in progress. (4)
|███                          | As per PCF exit, team migrated to Springboot (4)
|███                          | TBD, due to Business priorities (4)
```

---

### **Summary Table**

| Aspect           | Description                                                                                       |
|------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Purpose**      | Capture context, status, blockers, or notes on application modernization/migration/decommission   |
| **Unique Values**| 120+ (free-text, technical and project management notes)                                          |
| **Top Values**   | "This is not partial. Timeline is correct", "Database servers & EAMS Status decommissioned", etc. |
| **Data Type**    | Free-text, unstructured                                                                           |

---

Let me know if you need a more detailed breakdown, grouping by status, or suggestions for cleaning/structuring this column!
